job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Have you ever wanted to be part of a strong, fun-loving team that develops planet-scale distributed database and takes pride in making its customers happy?  Come join the Azure Cosmos DB Store and High Availability team, where you will be working on one of the fastest growing Azure services that provides globally distributed, low-latency, massively scalable, multi-model cloud database service. It is designed to enable developers to build planet-scale applications.  This role is within the group which works on High Availability (Replication, Leader Election, Geo Failovers, Multi-Master, Tunable Consistency Levels, Disaster Recovery), Storage (Row Store, Column Store, Log Structured Store), Inverted Index, Database Engines like BW-Tree and other LSM technologies. The group fosters a diverse, inclusive, and collaborative work culture that prioritizes people at all times.  In this role, you will have a fantastic opportunity to work on Azure Cosmos DB distributed Store, ensure its 24x7 high availability and help shape its future alongside other highly talented engineers in a very diverse, inclusive work environment to deliver differentiated value in the No-SQL database space. These requirements include but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings  Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.  Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.  #AZDAT #ENGJOBS  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.
